name: Swimming Leningrad
description:
This game was made for the Newgrounds July Jam 2021, the theme being: Egg!

We came up with an idea of an Advance Wars style game, except with fish and guns because it seemed funny. 

HELP

  • Clicking on the egg carton allows you to acquire more units.
  • You gain """money""" at the end of each turn. This is a global amount. The amount gained per turn can be increased by taking over Magazine tiles.
  • Shooting only targets the enemy that is closest to you. They cannot counter.
  • The stats and their function are as follows:
    • HP - How much damage a unit can take. If it reaches 0, they're dead.
    • ATK - How much damage the unit will do during melee combat.
    • POW - How much damage the unit does when shooting.
    • DEF - How much damage is negated.
    • MOV - How many tiles the unit can move.
    • VIS - How far the unit can shoot.

SOURCE
github.com/GoggledPetilil/swimmingleningrad
